meaningMnemonic: A <kanji>rut</kanji> in the <kanji>road</kanji> is for some reason an <vocabulary>orbit</vocabulary> or <vocabulary>trajectory</vocabulary>. Maybe imagine a big ol' rut in the road. You drive at it at very high speeds, hit it, and fly into the sky at a <vocabulary>trajectory</vocabulary> that will send you into <vocabulary>orbit</vocabulary>. Now you're up in space, circling the earth, wishing you didn't drive so fast.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
